body:
```
cd build
rm Makefile.am
cmake ..  \
-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$HOME/usr  \
-DRT_LIBRARIES=$HOME/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so  \
-UTIL_LIBRARIES=$HOME/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libutil.so 
```

_Edit:  paths should be without libs_

Not using cmake macro ?   
( https://github.com/repoforge/rpms/blob/master/specs/cmake/macros.cmake )

> -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=%{_prefix} \\\
> -DCMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR:PATH=%{_libdir} \\\
> -DINCLUDE_INSTALL_DIR:PATH=%{_includedir} \\\

...  Ok. 

```
...

I can not find missing something.

`mkdir -p ~/usr/bin ~/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu`

```
$ make

## **Curiosity:**

```
cd build
rm Makefile.am
cmake ..  
make
100% ...
```
Feeling :  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LbjLvMISqCw

but not working with qtox 1.10.2, because

**1.**  ( build  mkdir build ; cmake .. ;make )
can not find libs
**looking** /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/
**are in**   /usr/local/lib/

I tried link without rebuild
```

# ln -s /usr/local/lib/libtoxcore.so.1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtoxcore.so.1
# ln -s /usr/local/lib/libtoxcrypto.so.1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtoxcrypto.so.1
# ln -s /usr/local/lib/libtoxdht.so.1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtoxdht.so.1
# ln -s /usr/local/lib/libtoxnetcrypto.so.1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtoxnetcrypto.so.1
# ln -s /usr/local/lib/libtoxfriends.so.1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtoxfriends.so.1
# ln -s /usr/local/lib/libtoxmessenger.so.1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtoxmessenger.so.1
# ln -s /usr/local/lib/libtoxgroup.so.1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtoxgroup.so.1
# ln -s /usr/local/lib/libtoxav.so.1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtoxav.so.1
# ln -s /usr/local/lib/libtoxencryptsave.so.1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtoxencryptsave.so.1
```


**2.**  

```
$ qtox

home/tele/.config/tox/tele.tox looks like binary file.

OS: Debian 9.0

comment_data.body:
Sometimes for build I use 
`checkinstall --install=no`
for build fast way .deb package.
But with 

```
autoreconf -fi
mkdir _build && cd _build
../configure
make
checkinstall --install=no
```

Working   
Working QTox **only** with  **libsqlcipher0** 3.2.0-1.1 from jessie-backports 
not working with  **libsqlcipher0**  Debian stable 3.2.0-2 .
1. This help with old qtox binary
2. And it help with new qtox.

This time I rebuild toxcore without paste links

```
cmake ..  \
-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr  \
-DRT_LIBRARIES=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ \
-UTIL_LIBRARIES=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/
```


Working QTox
```

title: c-toxcore 0.1.9 cmake
